name: Naturesweet, Tomato Cherry Cherub Conventional, 10 Ounce
short_description: Selected and stored fresh
Sourced with high quality standards
Recommended to wash before consuming
Delicious on their own as a healthy snack or as part of a recipe
product_description: The World's Favorite Snacking Tomato: Bursting with sweetness, NatureSweet Cherubs grape tomatoes are the perfect bite-sized treat for salads or snacking straight from the container. Ethically Sourced, Unmatched Flavor: Our tomatoes are Fair Trade & EFI Certified, ensuring fair wages, safe working conditions, community development and education programs for our Associates. At NatureSweet, we cover the cost of the Fair Trade Premium so that we can transform more lives without increasing the cost to the consumer. Vine-Ripened & Hand-Picked: Carefully nurtured in greenhouses and harvested at peak ripeness for maximum flavor and freshness. Hand-picked to preserve that burst of flavor which made Cherubs loved by adults and children. Naturally Sweet & Nutritious: Packed with Vitamin C for immunity and healthy skin, Lycopene for heart health, and Beta-Carotene to support eye and bone health, these non-GMO tomatoes are a delicious way to support healthy living. Sustainable & Socially Responsible: A Certified B Corp committed to fair labor practices, environmental sustainability, and community support. We pay transformational wages and support the community development of our Associates.

name: Crisco Butter Flavor All-Vegetable Shortening, 16 Ounce
short_description: For those cooks and bakers who know how amazing shortening is, but also want a rich, buttery flavor in their food. Crisco is Baking
50% Less Saturated Fat than Butter
0g Trans Fat Per Serving
Excellent source of ALA Omega-3 fatty acid
Gluten Free and Kosher Pareve
product_description: Crisco is Baking - Since its introduction in 1911, Crisco has revolutionized the way food is prepared and the way it tastes. From being the first shortening product made of plant based oils and oil seeds to creating the first cooking oil that was promoted for its light taste, Crisco has been making life in the kitchen more delicious for years.

name: Richtex Vegetable Shortening 3 lb, 12 per case
SWANSON S Vegetable Stock, 32 oz Carton
short_description: Swanson vegetable stock is made with quality ingredients for a rich homemade taste
Gluten free stock with no preservatives, no artificial flavors or colors
A vegetable stock made with farm-grown vegetables and a simple seasoning for high quality taste
Use it to enhance soups, stews, and casseroles, or replace water in recipes to infuse rice, grains, and pasta with bold, savory taste
Swanson makes it easier to deliver superior quality and rich flavor in every dish
product_description: Bring rich, full-bodied flavor to your kitchen with Swanson Vegetable Stock. Crafted with quality ingredients, this vegetable stock is the perfect foundation for creating homemade meals that feel anything but ordinary. Swanson brings decades of expertise to your kitchen, delivering a depth of flavor that elevates every recipe. From hearty soups to savory sauces, this vegetable stock is your go-to for meals that impress. Swanson Vegetable Stock is made without artificial flavors or artificial colors, so the taste of real ingredients shines through. Gluten-free, vegetarian, and made with non-GMO ingredients, it's perfect for cooks who care about what goes into their meals. From simmering soups and stews to creating perfectly savory sauces, Swanson Vegetable Stock is incredibly versatile. Stir it into rice or grains for added richness, or swap it in for water when sautéing veggies or reheating leftovers to boost flavor. Cooking at home doesn't have to mean starting from scratch. Swanson Vegetable Stock inspires creativity in the kitchen, helping you turn simple ingredients into unforgettable meals. It's the perfect foundation for homemade cooking, elevating everyday recipes and connecting you with the joy of creating meals to share.
product_details: Best Sellers Rank #23,956 in Grocery & Gourmet Food ( See Top 100 in Grocery & Gourmet Food ) #1 in Packaged Vegetable Stocks

short_description: Pack of twelve, 16 ounce (Total of 192 ounce)
product_description: Crisco All Vegetable Shortening, 16 Ounce. Warning: Shortening will catch fire if overheated. Damage or serious burns may result. Do heat shortening carefully, uncovered, on medium heat. Do reduce heat if smoking occurs. Do not leave unattended while heating. Do not refill can with hot shortening. If shortening catches fire: do turn off heat. Do cover pot until cooled to room temperature to avoid reignition. Do not carry pot until cool. Do not put water on hot or flaming shortening.

name: Earth Balance Plant Butter Original Plant Based Oil Spread, Non-Dairy Butter Alternative, 15-oz. Tub
short_description: What You Get: One 15-oz. tub of Earth Balance Plant Butter Original Plant Based Oil Spread
Flavor You Crave: Non-dairy, vegan butter alternative with great rich taste
Great Anytime: Spread it on toast or hot muffins, use it to sauté vegetables, or incorporate into baking recipes
A Tasty Kitchen Essential: Variety of uses and great rich taste make it an ideal butter alternative
Just the Good Stuff: Vegan plant butter is free from hydrogenated oils, gluten free, lactose free, and contains no MSG
product_description: Earth Balance Plant Butter Original Plant Based Oil Spread is a delicious butter alternative that offers all the rich taste you crave in a non-dairy spread. This 77% plant-based oil spread is perfect for spreading, frying, sautéing, and baking. It contains 0mg of cholesterol per serving, is an excellent source of Omega-3 ALA with 400mg per serving, which provides 25% of the Daily Value for ALA1, and includes Vitamin A. Free from hydrogenated oils, this vegan spread is also gluten free, lactose free, and contains no MSG. Whether you’re spreading it on toast or hot muffins, using it to sauté vegetables, or incorporating it into your baking recipes, this plant butter will delight your taste buds and win your heart. Its variety of uses and great rich taste make it an ideal butter alternative and kitchen essential. Earth Balance believes that plant-based eating is a delicious way to enjoy food while respecting the planet, which is why this spread is Non-GMO Project Verified, Certified Vegan, and made with Certified Sustainable Palm Oil. This butter substitute is plant-based diet friendly and comes in a convenient, 15-ounce refrigerated tub. 1See nutrition information for fat and saturated fat.
product_details: Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 1 x 10.2 x 14.2 inches; 15.01 ounces
